channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NYT Connections Hints Today: Saturday, December 20 Clues And Answers (#923)
item.description: Looking for today's NYT Connections hints? Some help and the answers for today's game are right here to help keep your streak alive.

item.title: ‘The Housemaid’ Snaps Sydney Sweeney’s Rotten Tomatoes Streak
item.description: Sydney Sweeney's new movie, The Housemaid, has broken a Rotten Tomatoes streak of underperforming films. It could do so at the box office, as well.

item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Saturday, December 20
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: DraftKings Enters Prediction Markets With New App
item.description: The success of Kalshi and Polymarket has prompted a raft of competitors to launch similar products.

item.title: iOS 18.7.3—Which iPhones Can Run Apple’s Critical New Update?
item.description: Apple has released iOS 18.7.3, but it's not available for all iPhones. As Apple tries to push users to iOS 26.2, which iPhones can run iOS 18.7.3?

item.title: Bottomless
item.description: Some pits are infinitely deep. Problems that, once addressed, always get worse. N +1. For some folks, the acquisition of money or power are like this....

item.title: Our practice
item.description: What do you do regularly? Where do you show up, what do you publish? Who do you ask, and what do you answer to? What gets better because you persist? ...

item.title: The thing about chess
item.description: In a typical tournament, you don’t score any extra points for winning with the fewest number of moves. Quickly isn’t the point.

item.title: Filtering ourselves
item.description: We don’t use the same language or ideas with an in-law that we do with our bar buddies. When the internet was young, people often chose to filter them...

item.title: Better than the cheap alternative
